text: Piippola is a former municipality in Northern Ostrobothnia, Finland. Since 2009, it became a part of the new municipality of Siikalatva. As of 31 December 2008, 1,251 people lived there. Neighbouring municipalities were Haapavesi, Kärsämäki, Kestilä, Pulkkila and Pyhäntä. It was founded in 1865. == Other websites == * Municipality of Piippola – Official website Category:1865 establishments in Finland Category:Former municipalities of Finland
title: Piippola
